DOC.brief_summary: In this first-in-man trial, safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and selected pharmacodynamics parameters of BI 1015550 will be assessed in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Single Rising Oral Doses of BI 1015550 in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
